title: lol problems
body: so i start lol, then i wait like 1 to 5 minutes stuck on authenticating, and when i get into the game, it doesnt let me play, i mean i have to wait an additional 5 minutes before hitting play button, but after i hit that button and it searches for a match, when it says ''Match accepted'', after it's done showing ''match accepted'', i'm just stuck there, and cant really play anything. any fixes ?

replies.body: i just figured out something, if you play vrom a vpn, you have no trouble at all, lol. i have no lags since i play with vpn.
Hope they solve the problem with the bad ISP and node that is happening.
also, it shows that i declined matches, even though i accept it.
and now i have  10 minutes to wait before i try to play again, because i declined too many matches, wtf
I only can join like one game a day and with lots of lags, then i lose connection just as you described

join the club, the resolution to my ticket:

Thank you for the logs you have provided.

Wish I had better news, but it looks like your connection to our servers is passing through a bad node that's outside of your ISP's network, there's nothing we can do from your side, but we're going to use the info you've provided to investigate further and resolve the issue.

I can't provide an estimate for how long this will take but it's our top priority at this point in time. Please let us know if you have any other questions regarding anything else.

Have a good day!

you have lags on the lol client too, huh ? well, hope the next patch is gonna do something, i sent a ticket too.

This might be related to some kind of network problem, but with the number of EU packet loss issues lately I'd like to check for that first. Use our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to scan the logs of one of your most recent games and take a screenshot of what it says when it's done.

It shows i have no issues, but i can feel the lag, my champion just goes sliding, and my lol client is lagging so bad, i'm stuck on authenticating for 5 minutes, then when i get into the game, i hit play and nothing hapeens for around 5 minutes again, it's so laggy the client, i dont know why, it worked good about  2 weeks ago.

Could you grab a screenshot of that [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) using the game logs where your champion was sliding around? That sounds exactly like packet loss, so I want to make sure of that first.

So that small amount of packet loss could have still been the main issue, since packet loss is essentially when your connection losses part of the data it's transmitting. Hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with those network logs, and they should be able to see what exactly was going on.
